divs: sighting detailsi was out in the driveway 4 days ago around 5 a.m. i spotted a flying object that had irregular flight patterns. the object decended and then vanished into the air. then, i saw another one. i ran inside to get my wife and she came out into the driveway. we saw several star like objects moving in the sky over about 1\2 an hour. one decended at a rate that is impossible. i would estimate about 20,000 ft in less than 2 seconds. we then tracked one along and it completely vanished right in front of our eyes. we saw another one that moved across the sky and then stopped. less than a second later it took off at a speed that is absolutely impossible. i would estimate that it went from 0 to 5,000 mph or more instantaneously. we saw another one fly directly into a cloud that had lightning flashing. i have been out there every morning since that first experience and i have seen them every single day. at least 4 or 5 per night. they look like flying stars. i started taking my binoculars out with me and this is what i saw this morning. 2 of them flew right over my backyard. about 10 minutes apart....on the exact same flight path. i was standing behind my truck when the first one came by. i got my binoculars on it and i rested my elbows on the tailgate to keep the binoculars steady. i saw a jellyfish type looking creature that appeared to be a living creature. it was oval shaped and had a black center. in fact, it much resembled a human blood cell. it had a glow in the dark type appearance that was blue. it appeared almost to be a blue glowing gelatin like substance surrounding some type of nucleus. it had a bulb type bottom and top and had like two bumps on either side that made it sort of look like a stretched out flying gelatin blue jellyfish saturn. sounds strange...but that is exactly what i saw and i saw it quite clearly. semi transparent. it's almost like you can see right inside it. i have no idea what it could have been....my final best description is.... it was a blue, semi transparent, jellyfish like, dark nucleus in center, it appeared to be living, glowing, saturn type look to it. i ran inside to tell my wife, my adrenaline was pumping and my hands and voice were shaking. i simply could not believe i actually saw one close enough to see what it is. i tracked it for as long as i could and it vanished in the distance. another one came by about 10 minutes later but i could not get a look at it like the first one. i know what i saw. i never really believed before but i know....there are unknown things flying in the sky. no one can ever convince me that there is not something out there because i clearly saw it. truly unbelievable.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Lehigh Acres
There were no other sightings in Lehigh Acres on or around August 9th 2011
Summary: Oval shaped flying jellyfish looking UFO. Dark center, looks like a living creature.
